website_summaries.verdict: Globe-trotters seeking a ready-made travel solution will appreciate the Xplorer's convenient Talk Abroad SIM. However, mounting expenses for a basic rugged handset will turn away existing GSM phone owners.
pros: The National Geographic Xplorer has a stylish, rugged body, a flashlight, an FM radio, and two phone numbers
cons: The Xplorer's call quality could be better, and it has a proprietary charger and a shared charging and headset port
Data is pricey and the cost of placing calls can quickly add up

customer_reviews.title: I guess they liked it too.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it until someone stole it. I kept this in my car as an emergency phone. I tested it with the SIM from my regular phone and the sound quality was fine. It had all the basics - phone, camera, music player and a flash light. It was rather difficult to open because the seal was very tight. That's a good thing. It had a proprietary charging cable and headphone jack so that was a bit of a pain when it needed charging.
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work on go phone sim cards
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice phone but i never could get it to work with my AT&T go phone sim card. It said sim card crash. The sim card worked ok in my nokia that came with the sim card. I took it to the AT&T store here and they said that those phones dont work in the US. The manual was only in some undetermined language. ( Turkjekistan) maby. Anyway i sent it back but since i didnt have a return sticker i was stuck with the return postage $10.00+. I now have a Rugby2 go phone from AT&T. Though it costs twice as much, it works, and thats the bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for an extra line I have for when my mother in law visits. She lives out of country so we give her this line for her to use. The phone has basic features but it is small enough to carry and rugged enough to withstand splash of water and drops here and there. The call quality was great and battery is great. The phone is basic, the screen is bright enough for daylight and the keys easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Working likea charm
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mother in law when she left US for India, and we wanted to get in touch with while she is in transit. I installed AT&T simcard, activated world roaming. It worked fine in US, worked in UK, and finally in India. Now she is using this phone with Vodafone sim card, and its working like a charm. I liked its weather proof construction, but the speaker quality leaves you with much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Adarsha

customer_reviews.title: Good basic phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, tough, basic phone. Do not buy it if you want to surf the web or have all the bells and whistles, it's pretty basic. Due to the water proofing, it's very hard to get the battery door open. I'm not downrating it much because of this because I rarely if ever need to take the battery out, but they could have put a grip on there or something.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Instructions and language support not good
customer_reviews.text: No instructions in English I bought the phone to use on a business trip to China since it has SIM card and my Verizon Droid X2 does not; however, when I received text messages in simplified Chinese it consisted only of little squares. Phone works well, but only as a phone.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT, solid little phone
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT, solid little phone. We used it on our honeymoon in Greece and France. It worked extremely well in both countries. It's very durable, and we loved the flashlight. It was easy to use and text on, and it also has internet capabilities. Highly recommended for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ash G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: One thing is it won't accept picture messages on ATT in the US, but can find solutions online. It is an overall good product. It does what it’s supposed to and does it well. No complaints, it showed up on time, is good quality, and packaging was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: mr.write

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these phones on different occaisions, and have had no problems using them in Jamaica. Call quality is exceptional with digicel or lime. Phone features are great, ease of use, fm reception great, imbedded flashlight exceptionally bright and useful,camera also great. Waterproof rugged and overall an excellent oudoor cell.RECOMMEND!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gruber

customer_reviews.title: THANK SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: IM VERY HAPPY WITH MY NEW PHONE, THANK SO MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My husband managed to crack the screen
customer_reviews.text: In general, this phone is tough, but not if you drop the screen directly on a pointed rock! It is a very basic phone that holds up to most other abuse.
customer_reviews.author: K. de Souza

customer_reviews.title: Basic phone, just works.
customer_reviews.text: basic unlocked GSM Quad band phone. I've used it in England, Spain, France, and Germany. Plain and simple, easy to use, takes sim cards.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: i am a construction worker i used to buy wimpy flip phones they would junk after 6 months this phone is not afrade of dirt water or droppingon the ground the light is very usefull
customer_reviews.author: scheem

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Simple phone that does the job in all weather conditions. I'm not worried about moisture leaking into the phone, or having it tossed around. Quad band gives me great reception for my phone carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Y

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Rugged, strong. Don't have to worry about it break down due to fall or water. Highly recommend for teens.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan M. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this in Central America, with different SIM cards in each country, Honduras (Tigo service), Nicaragua (Moviestar system), El Salvador (Tigo), Guatemala (Claro). No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Selva

customer_reviews.title: Below Average Phone-Non US Carger
customer_reviews.text: Phone has a nice appearance and feel, but a cumbersome operating system. Trying to place a call can take 3 or4 clicks on the Select button and there is no volume control on the ring. The charger supplied with the phone was a non US type with a cheap US adapter which didn't work, making it necessary to purchase a new charger adding $27.00 US to the cost. Bottom line: I like the looks and feel of the phone, but would be much happier with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: indestruca-phone
customer_reviews.text: my friends have given my phone a nick-name, indestructa-phone. because I routinely abuse it doesn't even get effected. I drop it, sometimes even throw it at the ground, it's still in perfect condition. I even used it as a skipping stone a couple of times! Thanks Samsung for making such a durable phone. If you are thinking about it, buy it, you won't be disappointed. Things I do with this phone -charge it like once a week. (that's how long the battery lasts) -shower with it -listen to music while showering -throw it at people/things -texting and phone calls are clear -use it as a hand flash light! I don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Montague

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions or Warranty Card
customer_reviews.text: The warranty card and the instructions were in Serbian, Croatian, and Macedonian. No one has been able to find any English instructions or warranty. No way to evaluate the device w/o instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Weissman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great simple phone!! small, durable, waterproof, and dependable! If you want a durable phone that is dependable this is your phone.
customer_reviews.author: david botten

customer_reviews.title: Rugged......just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect if you don't need the frills, and it's pretty rugged, I've used it for a month with no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Chand

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small numbers ,not easy to use, even you put the volume high, it is still difficult to hear. it does seem to have a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: NABUNYI H. MWAMIZINZI

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked Samsung Xplorer B2100 Solid Extreme Anti-Shock Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, it has anything that you want. This is the second phone that I buy because the first was stolen. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: aida

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: the phone work great even on extreme condition perfect for outdoor worker So you can drop it anytime and it still work
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Philippe Moyse

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: drop it in the water still works perfect after one year and some will buy again if needed not any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for this phone it over heated in my pocket now it has static. I have to reboot it more and more. Can't send it back !. Phone was a gift so no receipt. @. don't have box so I can't send it back.
customer_reviews.author: hayu

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a universal charger
customer_reviews.text: Just received my phone and can not charge it. I live in Mexico... Should be listed as European Version not International Version because it arrived with only a Euro Plug.....Should have a universal plug for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Anne

customer_reviews.title: UnLocked B2100
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and solid phone. Keep in mind it is not intended to be a full featured smart phone. Its strengths are being rugged and working with SIM cards from global providers. It does that very well. My SIM that I use when traveling outside the USA works perfectly with having to configure things, as does my T-Mobile when in the USA.The speaker-phone easily picks up the noise that is around you so I do have to keep that in mind more than previous phones I've had. The battery life is good. I have happily recommended this phone to friends that do a lot of traveling and want a rugged unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: great  phone
customer_reviews.text: This a great phone for the money I am not one to use the modern day smart phone I wanted a phone that could take the abuse of a working man. It was cheaper and better built than any phone offered from my provider.I had no problems with getting it to work,the instructions are in german but I looked on-line and got all the answers I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DiMambro

customer_reviews.title: Travel Phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use traveling overseas. Used it several times and I like it. Simple phone, but if that is all you need then this will fit the bill. Just to note, if you want to change the ring tone you have to create a profile to set it to, didn't figure this out until after returning from it's first trip when I needed a louder ring tone. Easily carried in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Gardner

customer_reviews.title: B2100
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I would have given 5 stars except the manual was not in English and the charger was for European plugs with a US adapter so it sticks out of the wall to far for my liking. Otherwise, this is a good no frills phone at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is Good Phone... BUT
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my first B2100. The B2100 is a very goo, tough phone. My first one (lost to car theft) had very good battery life. Battery lasted for several days when off. This particular one I got has lousy battery life. Dies quick even when left OFF. Seller also sent be a black one, when I ordered the red one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Deza

customer_reviews.title: paddling
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because a paddle every week and I wanted it just in case of emergency. went underwater several times. It does funny things afterwards, but I learnt to solve it by using a hair dried over it for a while. Very strongly built!
customer_reviews.author: O Larghi

customer_reviews.title: Great little international phone.
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Bangkok for a month, worked all over the country, got caught in the rain a few times. Charged quickly and good audio.
customer_reviews.author: Fungi

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Works great, dropped it a couple times too, thanks for the rubber bumpers...sound is excellent, but the ringtone could be a bit louder
customer_reviews.author: John Smokey Hatzimichaels

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this telephone for my Dad, who leaves overseas. Works great and the sound has a great quality, it is also shocker resistant. Very pleased with it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Chatoney

customer_reviews.title: It's what's advertised
customer_reviews.text: The phone is durable, looks the same as the picture, is in obviously new condition, has a pretty sweet remake of Pong pre-loaded (and some trial games), and I only have to charge it once every 6-7 days. It works with a TKS (German T-Mobile) SIM card, so the international aspect is true, and I like the pre-loaded ringtones.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little phone. It is very basic and I love that about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

product_meta.title: Unlocked Samsung Xplorer B2100 Solid Extreme Anti-Shock Waterproof Quad-Band Phone Red -International version with Embedded Flashlight
product_meta.description: Go RED with this Samsung SGH-B2100 Xplorer Quad-band Cell Phone! The Unlocked Xplorer by Samsung is the next generation in Utility devices that can go through checkpoints without any hindrance, and help you discover the unknown. This phone not only has the basics, but also more unique features that are tailored for the outdoorsmen inside of you. It features a flashlight with Dedicated key, so you are never left in the dark. It is also made of urethane (anti-shock materials), so it takes a beating and keeps on ringing. It is also water resistant to 1 meter, making it the ideal choice for your next fishing trip. The Xplorer is shock, water, and dust resistant, so it will be looking like new, on Monday morning when you tell your co-workers about your amazing weekend with Xplorer. It also features noise cancellation with dedicated microphone, so you can make phone calls at a party or in rush hour traffic without shouting or pressing your ear right up against the phone. Up to 1000 entries (phonebook) / Up to 9 hours talk time / Stereo Radio with RDS / Flashlight with dedicated key / Anti-shock / Water Resistant
feature_bullets: Unlocked Quadband GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Works on any GSM network, worldwide. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Extended Memory: microSD (TransFlash) card slot (up to 8GB)
Shock, water and dust resistant (IP57, MIL-STD-810F)
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars83 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
